alert.note: Alert for Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 12:13PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Covington and Jones Counties through 115 PM CDT... At 1213 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sanford, or 9 miles north of West Hattiesburg, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Moselle around 1230 PM CDT. Ellisville around 1245 PM CDT. Laurel around 1250 PM CDT. Tuckers Crossing around 100 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
